content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --DTC
      operator: empty
    - name: --DY
      operator: empty
    - name: --NOMDY
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.319
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: If --DTC and --DY were not collected, --NOMDY must be populated.
Outcome:
  Message: --DTC and --DY are not populated, so --NOMDY must be populated
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '319'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Information about the time of collection for any observation
                  is needed to identify the record. CLDTC is Expected, and the data
                  will, in most cases, contain CLDTC, CLDY, or both. However, some
                  studies (e.g., legacy studies) may not collect CLDTC or CLDY; in
                  those cases, CLNOMDY must be populated.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 6.3.3.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - LB
      - MI

json.Description: If --DTC and --DY were not collected, --NOMDY must be populated.

Outcome.Message: --DTC and --DY are not populated, so --NOMDY must be populated

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Information about the time of collection for any observation is needed to identify the record. CLDTC is Expected, and the data will, in most cases, contain CLDTC, CLDY, or both. However, some studies (e.g., legacy studies) may not collect CLDTC or CLDY; in those cases, CLNOMDY must be populated.
